title: Cockroach Poker (Royal)
tagline: Secretly pass along a card that may not be what you say it is. Will the recipient take a risk and call you out, or become complicit in the scheme?
good: Barefacedly lying to your friends, or tricking them into thinking you were.
Super accessible rules, gameplay, and theme.
Tons of table talk and laughter. A great social game.
bad: You want a game you can sink your teeth into. Cockroach Poker is a game to play every now and again, and in which there's not that much to get good at.
note: The game has a single loser - this can take the pressure off for some people, but others may find it off-putting.
